metadata.name: 'Bored devil' certificate of authenticity
metadata.description:
CERTIFICATE OF AUTHENTICITY  
Title: Bored devil  
Artist: Ozy  
Date: 2021  
Medium: Acrylic on canvas  
Dimension: 40x50

Notes:  
Once collected, send me your address via Twitter/Email to start the shipping process.  
Physical artworks will only be sent to the original buyers, discuss with the owner for secondary market sales.  
International shipping included (to reasonable locations).
